text:
dhAqtA rAqtiH sa#viqtEdaM ju#ShantAM praqjApa#ti rnidhiqpati#rnO aqgniH | 
tvaShTAq viShNu#H praqjayA# sa(gm) rarAqNO yaja#mAnAyaq dravi#NaM dadhAtu || 
sami#ndra NOq mana#sA nEShiq gOBiqH sa(gm) sUqriBi#rmaGavaqnth sa(gg) svaqstyA | 
saM brahma#NA dEqva kRu#taqM ~Myadastiq saM dEqvAnA(gm)# sumaqtyA yaqj~jiyA#nAM || 
saM ~Mvarca#sAq paya#sAq saM taqnUBiq - raga#nmahiq mana#sAq sa(gm) SiqvEna# || 
tvaShTA# nOq atraq vari#vaH kRuNOq - [  ] 46
